title: Local Home Cook Marketplace
purpose: To connect local home cooks with neighbors wanting to purchase home-cooked meals.
goals: Establish a review and rating system

features.title: Profiles for Cooks
requirements: Cooks can create and manage profiles

features.title: Menus with Photos
requirements: Cooks can create, update, and display menus

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Customers and cooks can review and rate each other

frontend.notes: Ensure responsive design for mobile and desktop

backend.notes: Implement RESTful APIs for user profiles, menus, and reviews

database.notes: Use for storing user data, menu items, and reviews

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement SSL/TLS encryption for data transmission
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Design the platform to handle growth in users and transactions
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Optimize loading times and system responsiveness

Customer: Sign up and browse cook profiles

successMetrics: Number of active cooks and customers
futureEnhancements: Introduce subscription model for premium features
Develop mobile application for iOS and Android
